title: Darkle BlueSimple Watch Face
summary: Darkle BlueSimple designed watch face for round watches (like LG G Watch R)
description: This is a WatchMaker design and so the free WatchMaker App must be installed onto your device before installing this watch face. WatchMaker can be found here: http://goo.gl/FMxUfYThis simple and free version of BlueSnake watchface.Features:- Time- Day- Date- Month- Watch battery reading - Phone battery reading (if battery reading is < 20 then text changing to red)- Includes 2 ambient modes (sun-rise to sunset and night version)- Optimized images (for better battery life)
descriptionHTML:
This is a WatchMaker design and so the free WatchMaker App must be installed onto your device before installing this watch face. WatchMaker can be found here: http://goo.gl/FMxUfY

This simple and free version of BlueSnake watchface.

Features:
- Time
- Day
- Date
- Month
- Watch battery reading
- Phone battery reading (if battery reading is < 20 then text changing to red)
- Includes 2 ambient modes (sun-rise to sunset and night version)
- Optimized images (for better battery life)
